channel.title: Half-Payne
channel.description: Half-Payne is a Half-Life mod that aims to bring some gameplay bits from Max Payne, such as Slowmotion, Diving move and Painkillers. [url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/half-payne/news/half-payne-black-mesa-minute-update-released[/url]

item.title: Half-Payne
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
Half-Payne is a Half-Life mod that aims to bring some gameplay bits from Max Payne, such as Slowmotion, Diving move and Painkillers.
